refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: I propose that all tests run by the org.openscience.cdk.test.CDKTests JUnit test suite, may not produce graphical output. Those tests should be put in org.openscience.cdk.test.GraphicalCDKTests instead.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: To be able to do automatic regression tests on CDK on machines that do not provide a X-server, e.g. http://www.sf.net/, the JUnit tests run by CDKTests should not give graphical feedback.
